text: Yangzhou () is a prefecture-level city in central Jiangsu Province, China. It sits on the north bank of the Yangtze. In 2010, 4,459,760 people lived there. Yangzhou was very wealthy in the history. For a long time, it was famous for its great businessperson's families, poets, artists, and scholars. ==Other websites== Category:Cities in China Category:Jiangsu
title: Yangzhou
